RepositoryName.Description: A name for the image repository. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a            unique physical ID and uses that ID for the repository name. For more information, see              Name Type.ImportantIf you specify a name, you cannot perform updates that require replacement of this resource.You can perform updates that require no or some interruption. If you must replace the resource, specify a new name.

RepositoryPolicyText.Description: A policy that controls who has access to the repository and which actions they can            perform on it. For more information, see Amazon ECR Repository Policies in the              Amazon EC2 Container Registry User Guide.
